name: DROP'EM Bowman
text: DISCRIMINATION...... I UNDERSTAND SOME JOBS ARE HARDER THAN OTHERS BUT WHEN YOU GET A MESSAGE ASKING FOR A PICTURE SO THEY CAN SEE IF YOUR TO FAT TO WORK FOR THIS PLACE... PLAY IT OFF BY SAYING CAUSE OF THE WEATHER.... IT DOESN'T HAVE NOTHING TO DO WITH THE WEATHER THERE HYPOCRITE AND WANT YOU TO LOOK A CERTAIN WAY TO MAKE THEM LOOK BETTER.....

resp.text: I'm so sorry this questioning offended you, but you must be fit to do this job.  Our Drivers work hard in all weather, and get up and down off of 20' Trailers, seine ponds, lift heavy Oxygen Tanks and more.  An overweight/out of shape person can't do this job - we have had a lot of turn over due to hiring unfit people.  We try not to do that now.  It's a waste of everyones time and a big insurance liability risk to us if they get hurt because they are overweight and unfit.

name: Jc Chandler
text: Super awesome people. Bought fish from them 3 times and still going back to buy more. Good folks. Ask them anything and they will help you out. Learned a lot from them. Good looking fish they raisin. I bought catfish this time.

name: Wesley Hays
text: Bought 200 from them 2 years ago and couldn't be more satisfied. Planning on calling tomorrow and hopefully purchase a couple of carp for my pond now

name: Doug F Frank
text: These folks go the extra mile to be friendly, provide a good product, informative, and organized to handle the volume they do. Thank Ya'll very much.

name: Jimmy Chambliss
text: Very helpful and knowledgeable. I've bought from them several times. Fish seem healthy.

name: mrramblinronn
text: Easy to order. Had a 3:30pm Appointment for Pickup at Cedartown Feed and Seed. Me and my wife were there at 3:30. We got a call about 3:45 from someone at the company explained to us that the driver was delayed and wouldn't be in Cedartown till 5. No problem. I understand that things do not always go according to plan. She was very apologetic and gave us our fish for half price. I was impressed. A lot of Companies these days are not geared toward customer satisfaction . I will order from them again! Fish were looked great!

name: Macy Bergen
text: I hope there will be more games like fireboy and watergirl on hudgames.

name: Roger Dyess
text: Very knowledgeable, responsive and Helpful

name: Abby Crocker
text: Great staff! Beautiful nursery. Fancy was very helpful to help me find my flowers. Will be coming back! I highly reccomened this place!

name: Susan Johnson
text:
Love, love, love going to Andy’s!!!  This is my Go-To place for spring flowers and my Boston fern! These plants are so well cared for; luscious foliage and continue to grow and provide beauty through Spring and Summer.  You can get Bonus Bucks during the month of March to redeem June 1st-June 10th. The employees are so knowledgeable and helpful and will help getting purchases to car!

Today I made another trip to Andy‘s and Andrew helped me choose my Boston fern for my screened porch and two dwarf globe Japanese Cedars for my front porch! Andrew is always so helpful and friendly and very knowledgeable! I love this place! 🥰

resp.text: Susan - Thank you so much for your glowing review! We always look forward to helping you with all your gardening needs!

name: Orlando J. Carlo
text: Great selection, beautiful plant. They have a rewards program. Great prices.

name: Sarah Liles
text: Everything looked so beautiful and you could tell the plants were taken care of. Prices are good and staff is very helpful and nice. Will definitely return.

resp.text: We look forward to helping you next time you are in! Thanks so much for the great review!!!

name: Christina Gailes
text: Great spot! Super friendly, plenty to choose from, even between seasons! Will be stopping in here regularly!

resp.text: Fantastic! We look forward to helping you with all your gardening needs!

name: Gina Key
text: Love to go to Andy's. They always have the best tomatoes.

name: Martin Bachtel
text: Andy’s is great.   It’s very organized and they have a great staff with lots of experience.   The place is laid out and merchandised well and is very nice.   Being a contractor I use them when I have jobs in Vestavia for good high quality material.

name: Barbara Zary
text: Apathetic employees. Poor customer service. Can’t be bothered to apologize or attempt to make things right.

name: man from earth
text: Great nursery. All the plants look healthy and Jan and the gang are wonderful to deal with.

name: Kevin Gardner
text: Great nursery with a good selection of seasonal plants, planters and garden decorations.

name: Edward DeMellier
text: We almost always find the plants and landscaping materials we want. We get good advice.

name: Jeremy Fisher
text: The mums are about to pop! They have all the colors!

name: JP Cruz
text:
Great selection. Great care and service. Hearty plants, knowledgeable staff. We keep coming back year after year. Consistently hearty plants.

Compared to the big box stores, Andy's plants have had a higher rate of survivability and hardiness. Demonstrably better plants, probably because the staff is so dedicated to the care and feeding of each plant.

Great knowledge of native plant species. The only place in birmingham I can get reliable insect control species and pollinator-friendly species in the same trip. Such a great selection, my son now has his own nursery in his room and is excited to care for each plant daily. Our front and back yards are now much more our own now that we've put roots down. Thank you, Andy! Your staff rocks!

resp.text: Thanks so much for being a loyal customer! We really appreciate your repeat business!

name: Austin Reese
text: Does Andy's source their compost from a landfill? I ordered 8 yards of compost, which itself was excellent quality, but had to remove 2 full yard bins of trash. Aluminum cans, large pieces of plastic, shredded children's clothing, a loaded shotgun shell and thousands of 1-3" rocks. I expected better of Andy's as we love their nursery and farmer's market but this was disappointing.

resp.text: We hate to hear this. Our compost comes directly from the leaf debris collected and composted by the City of Mountain Brook. We will pass along this laundry list of undesirable items. If you ever have an issue with the products we sell, give us a call so we can amend the situation immediately. 824-0233. Next time you are in, let us know and we will come up with something to amend this.

name: Bill Tiemann
text: Andy's is a great nursery and garden supply retailer. Anything I have ever needed in gardening supplies I have generally been able to pick up here. Andy's has anything a weekend gardener might need as well as bulk supplies such as mulch, garden soil gravel, and so forth. The staff is friendly and helpful, prices are competitive, and the two locations I've been to have been excellent. I highly recommend Andy's for your gardening needs and supplies.

resp.text: Thank you for the great recommendation Bill! We always look forward to helping you find just what you need for your landscape and gardening projects.

name: L W
text: This place is a great place to shop. They have great prices on the some on the best looking plants. Great selection too. The staff there is awesome!! They are so helpful and knowledgeable. They are friendly and willing to help with a smile.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the very kind words. We love our customers and we're here to help. We're getting in new merchandise all the time. Look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Nancy Reaves
text: My experience was wonderful. It was a very welcoming environment and the assistant/employee  was very knowledgeable in all areas that I inquired about. I will most assuredly be back, and will be (highly)recommending them to all my neighbors and friends. I’m thankful for Andy’s in staying the ‘above the rest’ neighborhood nursery we’ve come to know and love.

name: Nicole Matthews
text:
Andy’s is THE best place for home and garden needs. After visiting them I know I need to find a way to incorporate a water feature in my landscape.

For container inspiration and know how consulting Amanda was the best decision. My orchid pots are thriving and look elegant on my dining room table. I’m grateful she took time to explain the design look and thought process behind the design.

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us Nicole! Great news that your orchids are doing so well. Amanda is a wonderful asset and very knowledgeable.  We are here to help you with all your gardening design needs.

name: Ashley Moran
text: We've used Andy's for years to deliver soil, mulch, plants, shrubbery, Christmas trees, and more to our home. I've also picked up seasonal plants, ferns, flowers, and vegetables that have all been very hearty & healthy. The employees, particularly Rodney & Andrew, have always gone out of their way to be helpful and make sure I got exactly what I needed for the best price. We will continue to use Andy's for many years to come!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your kind words Ashley! We look forward to serving you in the future!

name: justin bradford
text: Andy's is amazing! I loved working with Amanda. She really knows her stuff. Great selection great prices. So convenient to Vestavia. I will be back!

resp.text: Justin - Thanks so much for shopping with us!

name: Amanda Dalvi
text: Super knowledgeable with great friendly staff. They even drew me a diagram of how to plant the trees I bought. And the selection of what you're looking for is phenomenal. Will go back to finish my backyard paradise 😉

resp.text: Amanda, thank you for coming in. Happy that we could help. Can’t wait to see some pics of that backyard paradise.

name: Elizabeth Livesay
text: I can’t say enough good things about Andy’s. We re-did the shrubbery in front of our house and they walked us through The whole nursery and gave us advice on what to get and how much. They also ordered anything they didn’t have in stocked and had it all delivered in less than a week! The prices are VERY resonable as well. So happy with my experience and the amazing customer service.

resp.text: Thank you so much for shopping with us! We are always here to answer any questions you may have. Look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Rider 0401
text: Andy's is the best!  They have an AMAZING selection of plants and planters and they are the only nursery that can make a soil mix that keep my succulents alive!  I have bought some succulents on the off season online and in the commercial stores and they don't hold a candle to Andy's.  The staff is just phenomenal, very knowledgeable and happy to answer any questions.  They also have a really cool little koi pond that my boys love!

resp.text: Kristina, thank you for coming in and shopping with us. The next time your in we have some fish food that the boys can use to feed the fish.

name: Judy Cutcliffe
text:
My go to place too! Staff can answer all my questions and are very helpful and courteous .
I buy all my plants at Andy's .I love redeeming those bonus bucks!  Judy Cutcliffe

resp.text: Thanks for the five star review Judy! We love helping customers with their questions. Look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Susan Richardson
text: Love this place! Huge variety to choose from! Knowledgeable, friendly staff that went out of their way to help and make sure I had what was needed. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words Susan! We try our best to help our customers in any way we can. Look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Wendolyn Martin
text: I’ve been here a few times and was satisfied every time. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks for being a loyal customer!

name: Kaye Waugh
text: I visited Andy's Creekside nursery  I was able to find different kinds of perennials that I don't have .I wished that there was a nursery close to my house that was as friendly and had the selection of Andy's. I locked my keys in the truck with my service dog . Andy and two employees helped me by calling On Star and the police to get my doors unlocked . They were such a blessing for me .I don't live in Alabama and was there to help my son who had been sick , I will never forget their kindness , concern , and patience they showed to me . I will be going back on my next visit to Alabama .

resp.text: Our Nursery is ever changing throughout the seasons. We look forward to serving you next time you're in town.

name: Elaine Robinowich
text: Andy’s was extremely professional as they completed a thorough spring cleaning of our yard.  They did everything as requested and left the yard looking great for the beginning of Spring.

resp.text: Thanks so much for using our Andy's Landscape Services! Look forward to helping you more in the future.

name: elizabeth smoot
text: The service and expertise at Andy’s can’t be beat!! Take your planters and let them take care of the rest!! Beautiful!

resp.text: We have fun creating beautiful mixed containers for our customers. Thanks so much for shopping with us Elizabeth!

name: Rhonda Weeks (Arcole)
text: Good selection of plants.

name: Lisa Silver
text: Andy and his staff were wonderful to work with when we ordered a tree as a memorial gift. They were on top of everything and delivered as promised. I highly recommend this nursery!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much Lisa! Tree Memorials are a wonderful way to remember those we love. We were honored to help make this possible.

name: Garrett Hutchins
text: Very helpful and friendly staff and a great selection of plants

resp.text: Thanks so much for the five star review! We look forward to helping you with all your future gardening needs!

name: Ur mOm
text: Can’t wait to decorate my landscape with what I saw at Andy’s.  Staff was very helpful and the plants were beautiful and there was a great variety.

resp.text: Thanks so much for shopping with us Cassandra! We look forward to helping you again in the near future!

name: Frank Saunee
text: Love seeing all the videos of the plants  in fountains. The displays are very appealing.

resp.text: Thanks so much! We are excited about our new line of fountains. Looking forward to warmer weather.

name: Mollie Barrett
text: LOVE this nursery!! Wish it was closer to my home town..everyone is super helpful knowledgeable  and friendly!! I'll be back!!

resp.text: We look forward to helping you next time your in town. Thanks so much for shopping with us!

name: Jamie Smith
text: Always a great experience with people who really know their stuff! Will definitely be back soon!

resp.text: Fantastic! Please come back and often! We are getting more and more new merchandise in all the time. Look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Bryan Jenkins
text: True professionals within their industry. They are always prompt, courteous and knowledgeable. I buy from Andy’s anytime I need flowers, shrubs, plants or trees.

resp.text: Thanks so much for being a loyal customer! We love helping you out and look forward to helping you with your gardening needs in the future.

name: Lynn Stanford
text: service was great

name: Darren Mullinax
text: Great service. Staff was extremely helpful and the storefront was well organized.

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us Darren! We pride ourselves on having knowledgeable staff. Looking forward to helping you with all your gardening and design needs.

name: B H
text: Amanda has a outstanding personality and a smile from ear to ear that lights up your day. Thank you Andy's

resp.text: Thanks for the glowing review Billy! We look forward to helping you with all your landscape, gardening and design needs.

name: tim townley
text: Love love Andy's and in the last month the stores really coming together and can't wait for the veggies

resp.text: As the weather improves, we will bring in more and more veggies. Look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Linda Shunnarah
text: Tracy was very helpful and nice. Answered my questions and gave me options. Thanks

resp.text: Thanks so much for shopping with us Linda! We look forward to helping you in the future.

name: Deborah Newsom
text: Fantastic service - very personable.  Will answer any question and the employees go out of their way to assist you with anything you need.

resp.text: Thank you so much for shopping with us Deborah. We try to help out as much as we can. Look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Leslie Livingston
text:
I love the plants at andys .!!! #AmadaDoesGreatWork!
Will recommend andys .!

resp.text: Thank so much Leslie! We love Amanda and agree - She does amazing work. Thanks for the recommendation and review!

name: TLSJohn
text: Great staff and very helpful! Highly recommend Andy’s!

resp.text: Thanks so much for shopping with us! Our staff looks forward to helping you with all your gardening and design needs in the future.

name: Marshall Auerbach
text: Large selection of plants and flowers. Very helpful and friendly.

name: Tracy Townley
text: Beautiful plants, and helpful and talented staff.

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us Tracy! Look forward to serving you again in the future.

name: Amy Tankersley
text: Always friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thanks so much Amy! Look forward to helping you in the future!

name: brad topper
text: Excellent!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for shopping with us Brad!

name: Andrea Nuss
text: Staff was very help and friendly. I will b returning soon.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business! We look forward to helping you next time you are in!

name: Rhonda Bellew
text: I absolutely love the plants at Andy's!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for shopping with us Rhonda! We love plants and really appreciate your business!

name: Ben
text: Very helpful!

name: Robin Wilkie
text: If you want to have a pond, this is the place to go! They have it all! Lotus blooms aren't ready yet, but the water lilies are beautiful! Great place to take a day date on!

resp.text: It was GREAT to meet you Robin!  Thank you for the 5 star review!!!

name: Shawn Gaines
text: Great place if you in the pond and koi hobby

resp.text: Thank you Shawn, your review means a lot to us!

name: Donald Quinnn
text: The best place to get all you fish needs

name: Susan
text: This place has AWESOME fish and supplies!!! All the employees and owners are super nice, friendly and helpful!!!

resp.text: Hi Susan, thank you so much for the 5 star review! Customers like you make our day :)

name: Jennifer Price
text: The woman was wonderful! She helped me pick my lotus, and answered all my questions

resp.text: Thank you Jen!  It was my pleasure to help you with your beautiful lotus! ~ Tammie

name: Dennis Hessler
text: These friendly folks put in a beautiful pond for me at a good price and with attention to detail that surprised me. One of the few businesses I've ever worked with that returned after the final payment was made to do some touch-ups. They made sure my lights worked and flushed out the pond. These people keep their word, they know what they're doing, they're prompt, and they're friendly. Thanks Mark and Mike and Tammie. Highest recommendation.

resp.text: Thank you Dennis and Kae for your amazing review! We truly enjoyed working with you and love your beautiful Pond. If you need any help in the future you know we will be here for you.

name: Steve Vining
text: Amazing service and I got my 2 favorite fish, Tess

resp.text: Hey Tess, we appreciate you!  Keep us posted on your fin babies.

name: Catherine Poore
text: Beautiful ponds/business!

resp.text:
Hi Catherine,
We appreciate your 5 star rating!  We hope to see you again soon.
Cheers, Tammie

name: Beverly Willams
text: I have done business with them for 2 years and have been extremely pleased. They put in a pond for me and have been great about answering any questions and always have really pretty good quality fish to choose from. I also use their maintenance service and it has been wonderful. Dependable

resp.text: Thank you so much for the awesome review! Much appreciated.

name: Bree Gary
text: Beautiful ponds!

resp.text: Hi Bree - Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  We appreciate you and hope to see you at the shop again soon.

name: Kelsey Little
text: very zen like, they are professional and have a large selection of plants as well as fish

resp.text: Thank you very much, your kind words mean a lot to us!

name: Kenneth Richardson
text: Fast friendly service

resp.text: We appreciate the 5 star review Mr. Richardson!  Many thanks!

name: Wanda Clark
text: Very nice and helpful woman.  Got down on knees to scoop mosquito fish out.

resp.text: Thank you so much for rating us, Wanda.

name: Rachell Dees
text: The coy fish are absolutely beautiful !

resp.text: Thank you Rachell, we appreciate you.

name: James Dyess
text: Have bought many pond plants and some fish here and have been very satisfied.

resp.text: Thank you James.

name: Taylor Bartlett
text: Very helpful employee and lovely plants/fish.

resp.text: Thank you so much. It's our pleasure!

name: Autumn Thatcher
text: Always great customer service  and products!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to rate us! Glad you were happy with our services.

name: Marvin Ginns Sr
text: Beautiful pond exhibits and a wealth of knowledge. If you are planning a pond or water garden, you should make it a high priority item to talk to these guys. It will most certainly save you a lot of grief and money.

resp.text: Thank you Marvin!  Your review means a lot to us!

name: Doug Morgan
text: These guys are flakes.  I would not recommend doing business with them.

resp.text: Hi Doug - We are sorry that you didn't have a positive experience with us.  Pond Elegance is under new ownership as of April, 1 2019 with great reviews.  We would love an opportunity to show you our new business.

name: John Waldron
text: If you want a.pond you need to go here before you buy

resp.text: Thank you for the great rating John! We appreciate you.

name: Jamarcus Eirby
text: Loved it

resp.text:
Hi Jamarcus,
Thank you for the 5 star rating!!! We appreciate you and look forward to serving you in the future.
Cheers, Tammie

name: Annett Bosarge
text: Love this place...

resp.text: Hi Annett - thank you for your review!  We love having you here.

name: jessica Valentine
text: Very helpful.  Clean. Will be going back !

resp.text: Thank you very much for the great feedback.

name: Elvis Duke
text: Liked

resp.text: Hi Elvis - thank you for the review, we really appreciate it!  Tell us what we can do to earn your 5 star review.

name: alan briggs
text: Outstanding workmanship and very  professional, informative, and all around great  people! !!!! Thank you Neal, Mike, and David!!!!  David is a true  artist with stone  and rocks! !!!!!!!!!  Thanks  again!!!!!!!#!#

resp.text: Glad to hear you liked how everything turned out, Alan.

name: Carmen Eubanks
text: Great

resp.text: Thank you Carmen!

name: Angel Folker
text: Awesome place

resp.text: Thank you for visiting us and for the rating Angel!

name: Mariah Mccovery
text: I love this place

resp.text: And we love having you visit!

name: Michael Henderson
text: Hi quality

name: Dawn Wheeler
text: Andy's gardens are beautiful, each one unique, but all are beautiful!

name: Caroline Sanstead
text: This is not readily apparent anywhere, but they do not have a public storefront. No sign, no front door, no one on-site. It was not clear on the website if they were just remodeling, temporarily closed for the season, or simply no longer operating a store. Don't waste your time driving out there if you're looking for pond supplies.

name: Jeff Thomas
text:
Under new ownership,  great experience.
The staff was very helpful and the store was nice and uncluttered. I will return.

name: Debbie Haywood
text: Nice friendly staff. Beautiful fish! The fountains are gorgeous. Its a bit pricey.. but you get what you pay for, right

name: Steven Thompson
text: Staff was nice, but the butterfly koi that we purchased Saturday died yesterday and they only have a 48 hour policy on fish death. If you spend over a hundred dollars on a fish and it dies in 3 days you are out of your money for nothing.

name: A A
text: These guys are top notch. Highly recommend.

name: Jeremiah Johnson
text: Great pond plant selection, but too pricey on the fish and supplies.

name: Chesley Crain
text: Great selection. Staff was super helpful!

name: Ismael Torres
text: Anything you need for your garden

name: Sherry Rousseau
text: Great selection

name: Clayton Crawford
text: Wonderful world of plants

name: Tina McAnally
text: We started a new small pond with a waterfall & they were absolutely GREAT to help us!!  Supplies Fish Landscaping  EVERYTHING we needed .... they were patient -i asked 100 questions, some twice.  Covid had just started so it was new to them to adapt but they were safe & supportive.  I couldn't ask for anyone more helpful & with great selections!!

resp.text: Thanks for your review, How we may be of help again. Have a great pond year!!!

name: C W
text: Great place and very helpful staff. Will definitely return.

name: Bobbie Waggoner
text: We drove 2.5 hours to get to this place and it was well worth the drive! The quality and prices of the plants and fish are outstanding. The owners and customer service was great! We Will definitely be returning and I highly recommend it!!! This will most definitely be our go to place for pond supplies and the grounds were gorgeous!

name: Tyler Dyer
text: Great people. Fantastic help! Awesome place!

name: JessaB
text: Best place to get pond accoutrements and even fish! Extremely knowledgeable and helpful. Downside...you leave wanting acres of ponds and fish!

name: Primarily Ponds
text: Great place for fish and aquatic plants very helpful

name: Judy Jones
text: Very nice owners and quality merchandise. Very helpful if you have a problem and need help with a repair.

name: Keith Anderson
text: Great people to deal with.

name: Charlene Brueggman
text: It was a great a place to explore and get great ideas for our jome2.  Peaceful and very nice owners.

name: Greg Mattson
text: Great place to buy plants and fish and also supplies for your pond. Staff is very helpful.

name: Terece Morelli
text: Healthy beautiful Koi and Goldfish,  great prices and plants too!

name: Alex Bailey
text: Very friendly and helpful every time we go.

name: Kimberly Goodman
text: Loved this place very much. Got the plants i wanted plus a fountain👍👍👍
